text: I totally agree with Ivan's comment about the worst case scenario. Yes, always think about how the visuals will look when there are alot of APIs. I have worked with customers who have over 10,000 different APIs to visualize, and managability becomes a serious issue, unless this is designed only for small sets of APIs

text: I tried it and got pretty lost in the zoom in and out stuff so I gave up after 5 minutes. Is there a video tutorial I can follow which explains it?
